name: Marble Maze Mania
description:
My third project, utilizing randomly generated mazes.

Play in one of three different game modes and try to get to the end of the maze.

The game also comes with a fully-fledged adventure mode! Roll your marble to the end of seven simple levels.

With infinite amounts of content, tons of different modes, and several extras, this is easily my biggest game yet!

Instructions and Credits are in game.

Made in the Bronx Science Game Development class.
